title: Vektor
description:
Vektor es una banda americana de thrash metal de Tempe, Arizona.

Formada en 2004 por su pincipal miembro y guitarrista David DiSanto y el primer guitarra Erik Nelson, Vektor enseguida gano popularidad en la escena metalera de Phoenix gracias a su gran tÃƒÂ©cnica, con influencias del Speed thrash y Metal progresivo, despertaron interÃƒÂ©s con su primer CD Demolition (2006) y su demo de dos canciones Hunger for Violence (2007). DespuÃƒÂ©s de cuatro aÃƒÂ±os de giras locales y regionales como y como teloneros de Testament, Hirax, Iced Earth y Municipal Waste, Vektor se lanzÃƒÂ³ a realizar su primera gira a escala nacional con Exmortuspromocionando su album Black Future de Diciembre de 2009 hasta enero de 2010. TambiÃƒÂ©n estuvieron de gira por USA en Junio y Agosto de 2010 por su cuenta. Su album Black Future dsliÃƒÂ³ a la venta el 17 de Noviembre de 2009 bajo la Neoyorquina discogrÃƒÂ¡fica Heavy Artillery Records. La banda sacÃƒÂ³ a la venta su disco, Outer Isolation, el 22 de Noviembre de 2011 tambiÃƒÂ©n con Heavy Artillery compartiendolo en streaming vÃƒÂ­a online.


Conceived in December 2002 by front man/guitarist David DiSanto, Vektor quickly gained popularity amongst the Phoenix metal contingent for their unique mix of technical, speed, screaming vocals, and progressive metal influences. Vektor created a wave of interest with their self released demo Demolition (2006) and their two track demo Hunger for Violence (2007). After four years of local and regional performances as the opening act for such national acts as Testament, Hirax, Iced Earth and Municipal Waste, Vektor hit the road for their first national tour alongside label mates Exmortus in support of Black Future in December 2009 through January 2010. They also toured the US in JuneÃ¢â‚¬â€œAugust 2010 on their own. Their debut full length album, Black Future, was released on November 17, 2009 on NYÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Heavy Artillery Records. The band released their most recent album, Outer Isolation, on November 22, 2011 on the Heavy Artillery label. On the day of its release, Vektor streamed the full album online.



Albums:

Demolition (2006)

Black Future (2009)

Outer Isolation (2011)
